summary: This mod adds a custom follower named Django from the movie Django Unchained and can be found in the solitude dungeons and is a specialist in archery, one-handed and two-handed.
descriptionHtml:
Inspired by the movie Django Unchained this mod adds a custom redguard follower called Django from the movie. he can be found in the solitude dungeons and is a specialist in archery, one-handed and two-handed and is a sharp shooting slave just like he was in the movie.

check frequently for further updates.
Don't forget to Comment, Track, Vote or Endorse this mod.

Check out my mods:
> Bruce The Dragon Follower
> Hermit The Baby Mudcrab Follower
> Django Follower Mod

Follow me on Twitter @AidenGatani
author: Gallergar
